name: Atlantis Bar Suite
description: The Atlantis Bar Suite is a 971-square-foot king suite with a midcentury modern aesthetic and a built-in wet bar — purpose-built for entertaining after a round of golf. The redesigned suite connects to the Penthouse Villa for extended group configurations. Features include floor-to-ceiling windows, Concierge Lounge access, and the full complement of Atlantis premium amenities. A natural choice for the group organizer who wants to host a nightcap for the whole crew without leaving the room.
shortDescription: 971 sq ft king suite with built-in wet bar and midcentury design — ideal for post-round group entertaining.

faqs.question: Does the Bar Suite connect to other rooms?
faqs.answer: Yes. The Atlantis Bar Suite connects to the Penthouse Villa, making it suitable for large group configurations.

faqs.question: What size is the Bar Suite?
faqs.answer: 971 square feet — a one-bedroom king suite with a separate sitting and bar area.

testimonials.quote: The entire staff is very friendly which brings an added dimension to a quality experience. We will return on every visit we make to Reno.
testimonials.author: TripAdvisor Traveler
